cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: Stir 60ml of gin and 15ml of dry vermouth with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive or a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of tequila, 30ml of orange liqueur, and 30ml of lime juice with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed glass over ice or straight up. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle 6 mint leaves and 15ml of simple syrup in a highball glass. Add 45ml of white rum and 30ml of lime juice. Fill with ice and top with soda water. Stir gently and garnish with more mint.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Stir a sugar cube, a dash of Angostura bitters, and a splash of water in an old-fashioned glass until the sugar dissolves. Add 60ml of bourbon and some ice cubes. Stir until chilled and garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: Stir 60ml of rye whiskey, 30ml of sweet vermouth, and a dash of Angostura bitters with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.instructions: Stir 30ml of gin, 30ml of Campari, and 30ml of sweet vermouth with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of white rum, 30ml of lime juice, and 15ml of simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of bourbon, 30ml of lemon juice, and 15ml of simple syrup with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Optionally, add a dash of egg white before shaking for a frothy texture. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of vodka, 30ml of espresso, and 15ml of coffee liqueur with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with three coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of vodka, 30ml of cranberry juice, 15ml of lime juice, and 15ml of orange liqueur with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions: Shake 45ml of gin, 30ml of lemon juice, and 15ml of simple syrup with ice. Strain into a Collins glass over ice. Top with soda water and stir gently. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.instructions: Shake 45ml of gin, 15ml of lemon juice, and 7.5ml of simple syrup with ice. Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine and stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Shake 60ml of dark rum, 15ml of orange liqueur, 15ml of orgeat syrup, and 30ml of lime juice with ice. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Float 15ml of overproof rum on top. Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime shell.
